alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 27 at 12:18PM EDT until July 28 at 12:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. .Heavy rains over recent days combined with rainfall Wednesday morning allows for flooding to continue along the White River near Hazleton. Additional flooding along main stem rivers looks unlikely, but brief flooding is possible later this week as additional rain falls on the lower White basin. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flood water is near or starting on Pottsville Road. Low bottomlands are increasingly affected by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this evening to 11.7 feet early Friday morning. It will then below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
